revised_title: Experimental Breeding of Tænia echinococcus in Dogs
tldr: The author conducted experiments to determine if Tænia echinococcus, a parasitic tapeworm, could be bred from the echinococci of humans. They used four puppies and fed them hydatid fluid containing Echinococcus heads. The author found that the tapeworms were successfully bred in the dogs, confirming the connection between the human and canine forms of the parasite.
